comments:
Description:
EngineException when use birt:report to show a report with event handler.

Build number:2.2.0.v20061216

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a BIRT Web project, new a jsp file based on birt template.
2. Input content below in body:
<birt:report id="1"
             contextRoot="wtp_jsp_tags"
             height="300"
             width="700"
             reportDesign="event_handler.rptdesign">
</birt:report>
3. Copy attached resource.jar to your scriptlib folder.
4. run the jsp file.

Expected result:
Report shows style set in java class without errors. But if I preview the report in designer, it's ok.

Actual result:
Style effect is correct but throws EngineException.

Error log:
Label (id = 4): 
- Bookmark in hyperlink can not be null or empty. 
Bookmark in hyperlink can not be null or empty. ( 1 time(s) )
